data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This style guide is an update to the Ada 95 Quality and Style Guide to reflect the latest update to the Ada language, commonly called Ada 2012. The ____ of ____ guide ____ to ____ computer ____ produce ____ Ada ____ by ____ a ____ of ____ guidelines ____ will ____ impact ____ quality ____ their Ada programs. This style guide is not intended to replace the Ada Reference Manual, or the Rationale, or to serve as a tutorial for the Ada programming language.
data.partBlankContent: This style guide is an update to the Ada 95 Quality and Style Guide to reflect the latest update to the Ada language, commonly called Ada 2012. The pur____ of th__ guide i_ to he__ computer profes_______ produce bet___ Ada prog____ by ident______ a s__ of styl_____ guidelines th__ will dire____ impact t__ quality o_ their Ada programs. This style guide is not intended to replace the Ada Reference Manual, or the Rationale, or to serve as a tutorial for the Ada programming language.
data.answer: 这个风格指南是Ada 95质量和风格指南的更新，反映了Ada语言的最新更新，通常被称为Ada 2012。本指南的目的是通过确定一套直接影响Ada程序质量的指导原则，帮助计算机专业人员编写出更好的Ada程序。本风格指南的目的不是取代Ada参考手册或Rationale，也不是作为Ada编程语言的教程。
